title: 2017 FDA Science Forum May 31-June 1: Explore cutting-edge research, free admission
text: FDA will hold its 2017 FDA Science Forum from May 31-June 1 at the FDA White Oak headquarters in Silver Spring, MD. Learn how FDA applies new science and technologies to its regulatory decision-making and scientific activities.Join thought leaders from the scientific community and FDA scientists as they present FDA research into 3D printing, next-generation sequencing, Zika response activities, omics technologies, nanotechnology, biomarkers, the microbiome, Big Data, and more. Explore opportunities to collaborate with FDA in transforming food safety and biomedicine, and speak with experts. Free registration at: http://www.fda.gov/scienceforum
description: Join thought leaders from the scientific community and FDA scientists as they present their cutting-edge work at FDA's White Oak Campus in Silver Spring, MD . FDA experts highlight the science conducted at the Agency and demonstrate how FDA's research informs our regulatory decision-making and scientific activities. The FDA Science Forum will be held May 31 through June 1. Open to the public, select media interview opportunities available. Free registration at: www.fda.gov/scienceforum.
